content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 9, "index": 23}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 30, "index": 31}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 3, "index": 38}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 16, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft chiseled_stone_bricks, I need to first craft stone_brick_slab. To craft stone_brick_slab, I need to place 3 stone_bricks side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move one of the stone_bricks from slot 38 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 9, "index": 23}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 30, "index": 31}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 16, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I need to move another stone_bricks to the right of the first stone_bricks. Therefore, I will move the stone_bricks from slot 38 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 9, "index": 23}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 30, "index": 31}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 16, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I need to move the last stone_bricks to the right of the first two stone_bricks. Therefore, I will move the stone_bricks from slot 38 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 9, "index": 23}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 30, "index": 31}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 16, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the stone_brick_slab by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6

TASK: Craft an item of type: chiseled_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 9, "index": 23}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 30, "index": 31}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 16, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft chiseled_stone_bricks, I need to place 1 stone_brick_slab in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move one of the stone_brick_slab from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
